name: Quincy
description: A skilled archer who can target multiple bloons at once.

name: Gwendolin
description: A fire-wielding hero with area damage and popping power.

name: Striker Jones
description: A military strategist who enhances nearby bomb towers.

name: Obyn Greenfoot
description: A nature-themed hero who can summon thorned vines to attack bloons and buffs druids.

name: Captain Churchill
description: A heavy artillery expert with a powerful multi-shot attack.

name: Benjamin
description: A hacker who generates extra income and sabotages bloons.

name: Ezili
description: A voodoo witch who can hex and damage bloons over time.

name: Pat Fusty
description: A massive ape who slams the ground to stun and damage bloons.

name: Adora
description: A high priestess with divine powers and a transforming attack.

name: Admiral Brickell
description: A naval hero who boosts water-based towers and calls in naval support.

name: Sauda
description: A warrior hero who uses dual swords to attack and is a strong early-game hero.

name: Etienne
description: A drone-controlling hero who provides camo detection at a higher level.

name: Psi
description: A psychic monk that can delay bloons and does high single-target damage.

name: Geraldo
description: A mystical shop-keeper who sells unique items to assist you.
